Articles.Content:
The webcomic for the last week (starting @ comic#2981) has a rocket in it, I would love that in KSP. 

As the name implies, it's "Questionable Content." I don't know all of the forum rules, so I will not link to it, but it's not that hard to find.
I think KSP has enough parts for you to build the butt rocket on your own.
Where do I find a gluteus maximus and frilly lace?

I looked it up, haha!

Not likely to be made stock, though you could see what you can do with fairings and Kerbpaint ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Going to move this to Addon requests.

Two Roundified Monopropellant Tanks and a short solid fuel booster and you're good to go ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Somebody has to try this and cap it.

> 
> Going to move this to Addon requests.

Thank you, I was guessing what thread to put this under.
